name: Avian Photography Society
description:
A relaxed game without any real lose condition, where you walk around a nature trail trying to capture in-focus photographs of a rare species of bird (hand-modelled by Dan himself!). 

  • A and D to move
  • Hold Right-Click to aim Camera
  • Left Click to take picture
  • Mouse wheel adjust focus
  • Space to stop the trip skill check! 

Created for Honest Jam 4: The Pacifist Jam!
